channel.title: Needing some help with java (fixed)
channel.description: I have the up to date version of Java runtime and Development kit 7 u 25. My environmental variables are set thing is when I go to edit the server run.bat to my version of java and save it, it still says that java is not recognized as a external or internal command and just keeps popping that up over and over again. What is a recommended version that will work?

item.title: Needing some help with java (fixed)
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“ultimatepkvillage, post:4, topic:526176”]@echo off title Run "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\java.exe"-Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server start Run-Server.bat pause[/quote]

Why do you have “start run-Server.bat” in your batch script? Also did you install a 64bit or 32bit Java?

Read full topic
